column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Went to Bavettes because I plan on trying every major steakhouse in Chicago
column2: and it was Bavettes turn on the list.  The sat us at a cramped little table on what felt like a runway
column3: so obviously I asked to be moved
column5: and moved us to a booth in the lower level which I know sounds a bit sketchy
column6: but it was honestly the best decision I made.  The service was phenomenal and the food was great as well.  The waiter didn't interrupt our meal once
column7: but made sure we were taken care of.  I would definitely return to Bavettes
